newsitem.title: USA: Wavetech sees yrly revs up $15 mln with AmeriCom.
newsitem.headline: Wavetech sees yrly revs up $15 mln with AmeriCom.

text.p: Wavetech Inc said that Wednesday that its Interpretel subsidiary will launch a virtual office program through a new distribution agreement with AmeriCom Communications LLC.
The company said the agreement is expected to generate annualized additional revenues of $15 million by the end of 1998.
Under the agreement, AmeriCom will distribute the program to its existing customers as well as marketing it to new customers, said Wavetech.

The company said the virtual office program allows users to have 12-way conference calling, send and receive faxes, and provides over-the-line interpretation in more than 100 languages, among other features.
Wavetech said that its shareholders have also voted to change the company's name to Telplex International Inc.
